root.name: Harvest Moon GBC 2
root.description: OverviewHarvest Moon GBC 2 is a farming simulation game that was developed by Pack-In-Video for the Game Boy Color platform.The game made a number of improvements over Harvest Moon GB, such as the ability to build a greenhouse (allowing you to grow crops year round regardless of season), as well as the introduction of the ability to rear sheep on your farm.

similar_games.game: Rune Factory: A Fantasy Harvest Moon
